Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell system is complex with multiple variables strongly coupled.
Titulo: Data-driven fault diagnosis method for the safe and stable operation of solid oxide fuel cells system

Sentencas: Once a fault occurs, if it cannot be found in time, the initial minor fault may slowly evolve and spread to subsequent components.
Titulo: Data-driven fault diagnosis method for the safe and stable operation of solid oxide fuel cells system

Sentencas: Therefore, fault diagnosis is a promising approach to guarantee the stability of the system.
Titulo: Data-driven fault diagnosis method for the safe and stable operation of solid oxide fuel cells system

Sentencas: In this paper, the impact of air leakage and fuel starvation is investigated.
Titulo: Data-driven fault diagnosis method for the safe and stable operation of solid oxide fuel cells system

Sentencas: To diagnose the two types of faults, a novel data-driven online fault diagnosis method based on principal component analysis and support vector machine is developed.
Titulo: Data-driven fault diagnosis method for the safe and stable operation of solid oxide fuel cells system

Sentencas: Data comes from the entire stage of the solid oxide fuel cell system experiment.
Titulo: Data-driven fault diagnosis method for the safe and stable operation of solid oxide fuel cells system

Sentencas: The results show that the proposed method can effectively identify the air leakage and fuel starvation fault in real time.
Titulo: Data-driven fault diagnosis method for the safe and stable operation of solid oxide fuel cells system

Sentencas: Through comparison with traditional machine learning methods, this method shows higher accuracy and better generalization performance.
Titulo: Data-driven fault diagnosis method for the safe and stable operation of solid oxide fuel cells system

Sentencas: Moreover, it combines prior knowledge and statistical characteristics to extract effective features, thereby reducing the calculation burden.
Titulo: Data-driven fault diagnosis method for the safe and stable operation of solid oxide fuel cells system

Sentencas: Furthermore, with proper modifications, the proposed method can be extended to other types of solid oxide fuel cell system faults, which is significant in enhancing the reliability of the system.
